expo.name: sheltie

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses Location to determine animal shelters closest to you for results.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses Location to determine animal shelters closest to you for results.

expo.description: Search for pets available for adoption from local shelters. This app uses the Petfinder API and does not claim ownership to the data provided by Petfinder.
